about.title: About PolyGo
about.subtitle: Connecting Language Learners with Native Speakers Worldwide

hero.tagline: Break Language Barriers Through Real Conversations
hero.description: PolyGo is an innovative online platform that connects language learners with native speakers globally, providing real-time communication, AI-powered assistance, and cultural immersion experiences.

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.description: Language learners often lack real-world conversation practice with native speakers. Traditional courses focus on grammar and vocabulary, leaving students unable to communicate confidently.

points.p1: Difficulty finding suitable practice partners (timezone, interests, proficiency level)
points.p2: Lack of instant support tools (translation/error correction)
points.p3: Limited cultural exchange opportunities beyond dry language learning

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: A cross-platform language & cultural exchange platform that connects learners with native speakers worldwide, featuring AI-powered real-time assistance and cultural immersion events.

matching.title: Smart Matching
matching.description: Intelligent partner matching based on language goals, interests, proficiency level, and timezone

chat.title: Real-Time Communication
chat.description: Text, voice, and video chat with seamless WebRTC integration for instant conversations

ai.title: AI Translation & Correction
ai.description: Contextual real-time translation and grammar correction to help you learn as you speak

events.title: Cultural Events
events.description: Join online workshops, cultural discussions, and immersion sessions with global communities

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Earn XP, badges, and streaks to stay motivated on your language learning journey

subscription.title: Flexible Plans
subscription.description: Free tier for basic features, Plus subscription for advanced AI and exclusive events

usp1.title: AI Contextual Correction
usp1.description: Unlike basic translation tools, our AI understands conversation context and provides natural corrections in real-time

usp2.title: Cultural Immersion Events
usp2.description: Go beyond language learning with live cultural workshops, discussions, and community events

usp3.title: Community-Driven
usp3.description: Built by language learners, for language learners. Safe, supportive, and globally connected

competitors.title: How We Compare
competitors.description: We analyzed 10+ language exchange platforms to build something truly unique
competitors.ourEdge: PolyGo combines the best of all: smart matching + AI contextual correction + cultural immersion events

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Language Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of learners connecting with native speakers worldwide

contact.title: Get in Touch
